content: Give an example of how a person can reduce their consumption of single-use plastic.

Reducing consumption of single-use plastic can be achieved through several practical steps. One effective example is by switching to reusable alternatives. For instance, instead of using plastic water bottles, one can carry a stainless steel or glass water bottle. These bottles are durable, can be refilled multiple times, and significantly cut down on the number of plastic bottles used. Additionally, opting for reusable shopping bags made of cloth or other sustainable materials instead of plastic bags can make a substantial difference. By consistently choosing reusable options in everyday activities, individuals can significantly reduce their reliance on single-use plastics.
